questions.question: If I ___ earlier, I wouldn’t have missed the train.
questions.explanation: Third conditional: If + past perfect, would have + past participle.

questions.question: If she studied harder, she ___ pass the exam.
questions.explanation: Second conditional: If + past simple, would + verb.

questions.question: Had I known about the meeting, I ___.

questions.question: If it ___ raining, we could have gone hiking.

questions.question: If I were you, I ___ that job.
